DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine difference glucose control , fitness , body composition standard aerobic resistance exercise train program shorter-duration , high-intensity CrossFit training program overweight obese physically inactive adult . Hypotheses : 1 . Both group would improve glucose control , CrossFit group improve significantly aerobic resistance training group . 2 . Both group would improve fitness , CrossFit group improve significantly aerobic resistance training group . 3 . Both group would demonstrate decrease body fat percentage fat mass increase lean body mass , CrossFit group improve significantly aerobic resistance training group .
DOC.brief_title: CrossFit Exercise Improve Glucose Control Overweight Obese Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Overweight obese participant take part 8-week exercise intervention clearance doctor , expect improve glucose control , fitness ( Eurofit peak aerobic capacity ) , body composition ( body fat percentage , fat mass , lean body mass ) . After stratification age body mass index , participant randomize either standard aerobic resistance training exercise program relatively high intensity , short duration CrossFit exercise program .
DOC.criteria: body mass index ( BMI ) 25 < 40 , physically inactive ( i.e. , participate structure exercise program past 2 month exceed 30 total minute physical activity per week ) current smoker , pregnant , take blood glucose alter medication , heart disease , type 1 2 diabetes mellitus , total cholesterol 200 mg/dL high
